SummaryEnglish: The heir to the Gobo zaibatsu and the extremely vulgar Gobo Chama "Obochamakun" has transferred to Denenchofu Gakuen, an elite elementary school, and his best friends, Shuhei Kakino and Ojo Shoji, who Chama became friends with for the first time without the help of money. Samayo, a young lady who is also the fiancée of Chama; Kinman, a wealthy man who is second in wealth to the Gobo family; and Taizo, a poor man with a lot of pride and even an idiot from a former upper-class family. A bizarre and chaotic upper-class gag anime set in an elementary school with classmates with strong personalities!
SummaryJapanese: エリート小学校・田園調布学園に転校してきた、御坊財閥の跡取り息子にして超下品な御坊茶魔「おぼっちゃまくん」と、茶魔がお金の力を借りずに初めて友だちになった親友の柿野修平、御嬢商事のお嬢様であり茶魔の許嫁でもある御嬢沙麻代、御坊家に次ぐ大金持ちの袋小路金満、そして元上流家庭のおぼっちゃまでプライドの高い貧保耐三「びんぼっちゃま」などなど、そのキャラの濃～い同級生たちとおくる小学校を舞台にした、奇想天外でハチャメチャな上流階級ギャグアニメ！
